short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An open source extension that changes coordinate links on Wikipedia to a link to the location for the selected map service.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Wiki Mapper is an open-source extension that alters location-related links on all Wikipedia pages, and replaces them with a direct link to the selected map service.
